overview: Selling luxury apartments to the insanely rich is a profitable business, but it turns out that these people tend to be decadent, fickle and quite arrogant. They are used to getting what they want and often they want exclusive service... which may include more than just the apartment. Right now, you have three very wealthy ladies to do business with... and it's up to you to decide how successful you will be.
title: Crazy Rich Chicks
